title: Bites: In Panama City, a Restaurant That Lives Up to Its Name
text: BING NEWS: City bites doggie daycare for $100K In April, after months of attempting to placate the city, Karen Posner lamented, “It’s been an absolute nightmare. We haven’t been able to officially open due to the bureaucracy that the city has created for us.” Locked in a prolix regulatory ... 08/19/2015 - 3:33 am | View Link Island Bites: Aruba’s New Waterfront Eatery Aruba’s newest restaurant has opened its doors. It’s called ArubaVille, and the eatery is located at the former home of the Marandi restaurant. After a “complete transformation,” the property, which is located behind the airport on Bucutiweg ... 08/29/2014 - 11:45 pm | View Link Flavors of Westwood: Bollywood Bites chef, owner brings vast experience to table Bollywood Bites specializes in Indian cuisine, but its owner and head chef Sanjay Patel’s cooking style has drawn from and reached places as disparate as Panama, Bombay and Michael Jackson’s Neverland Ranch. (Miriam Bribiesca/Daily Bruin) Located at ... 05/6/2014 - 7:53 am | View Link 5 Bites of New York City’s Union Square Holiday Market In New York City, one sign that the holidays are near are the red and white checkered tents that take over Union Square Park each November and December.
